*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. Cable to Austin, March 28, 1827. Performance of certain commissions.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Natchitoches*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="03-28-1827">28th. March 1827*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*Dear Sir,*/p*
*p*I reed your letter of the *date_mentioned n="03-23-1827">23d. March*/date_mentioned* by *person_mentioned*Mr. John Cortes*/person_mentioned*, and; Enclosed letter to *person_mentioned*M. Slocum*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-27-1827">last evening*/date_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Slocum */person_mentioned*has Put your name down as a *person_mentioned*subscriber */person_mentioned*to the *location_mentioned*courier */location_mentioned*and will Forwd__*/p*
*p*it as circumstances will admit— I have Inclosed two letters To *person_mentioned*Samuel M. Williams*/person_mentioned* and some *location_mentioned*News Papers*/location_mentioned* of late dates which may give you some news that you have not Recd. I forwd— them by a *person_mentioned*Mr. Wetherspoon*/person_mentioned* stranger to me who is a going to *location_mentioned*St. Phillipe De Austin */location_mentioned* there was no letters in our *location_mentioned*Post Office*/location_mentioned* for you__*/p*
*p*I wish you would doe me the favor to send me some *location_mentioned*Mexican News Papers*/location_mentioned* if you can Obtain them convenient, *person_mentioned*Mrs Cable*/person_mentioned* wishes to be remembered to you—I am your friend*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. Cable*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*P. S. if you are in *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned*when you receive this Please to tell *person_mentioned*John Durst*/person_mentioned* th[at] his *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*is well—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. Cable*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches Texas*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
